puzzle.statement: “When I looked up toward Gemma’s row last night… only one presence felt cold. Just one vampire watching from above her.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 2 hunters neighboring Elise are neighbors of Fiona
puzzle.statement: “Two hunters linger close to me… but only one drifts near Fiona as well. I saw their shadows overlap for a heartbeat.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 1 hunter to the right of Felix are neighbors of Gemma
puzzle.statement: “Felix sat calmly… but the hunter to his right? I saw them brushing shoulders with Gemma. Just that one.”
“Above Felix… only one heartbeat didn’t beat at all. Only one of them is like me.”
“Left of Jasper, there’s just one of us lurking. Don’t bother looking for more in that direction.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 vampire between Elise and Wren
puzzle.statement: “Between Elise’s nervous glances and Wren’s sly smirks, I sensed one undead presence threading the space between them.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Elise is one of the 2 vampire neighbors of Gemma
puzzle.statement: “Gemma whispered to me—two neighbors chill her blood. And Elise… Elise is certainly one of them.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 3 of the 4 people whose names come before Fiona alphabetically are vampires
puzzle.statement: “I counted the folks whose names come before Fiona’s in the old ledger… and three of the four were pale as moonlight. Three vampires hiding in plain sight.”
“Xander shivers for a reason… two vampires loom above him. He may not see us, but he feels us.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Kyle has more hunter neighbors than Xander
puzzle.statement: “Between us two, Kyle stands with more hunters at his sides than Xander ever could. The man practically rallies them.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Xander has more hunter neighbors than Zeke
puzzle.statement: “Strange as it sounds, Xander’s surrounded by more hunters than Zeke is. You’d think Zeke would draw allies… but no.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Hailey has more vampire neighbors than Yara
puzzle.statement: “Hailey is surrounded by whispers like mine… far more than Yara ever is. You can feel it in the way people recoil from her.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Jasper has exactly 1 hunter as neighbors
puzzle.statement: “Jasper… that fiery soul only keeps one hunter beside him. Just one ally watching his back.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Hailey and Zeke have the same number of vampire neighbors
puzzle.statement: “It’s eerie—Hailey and Zeke attract the same number of our kind. Balance in darkness, I suppose.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Hailey has fewer hunter neighbors than Holden
puzzle.statement: “Compared to Holden’s ever-watchful guards, Hailey barely feels the hunters breathing down her neck. She’s far less watched… which I rather enjoy.”

gameSetting: Vampires have blended into the townsfolk. Only sharp eyes can expose the undead.
